# EntityMovementJumpComponent Class (Version 1.x.x)

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This documentation is for an older version of this module. Go to the latest documentation [*here*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/EntityMovementJumpComponent.md).

## Extends
- [*EntityBaseMovementComponent*](EntityBaseMovementComponent.md)

Move control that causes the mob to jump as it moves with a specified delay between jumps.

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:movement.jump";`
